#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<limits.h>
using namespace std;

#define time t1

int a[501][501],gt;

int main()
{
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
    int n,m;
    cin>>gt;
    cin>>n>>m;
    int i,j;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        for(j=0;j<m;j++)
         {
             cin>>a[i][j];
             
         }
    }
    for(i=n-2; i>=0;i--)
    {
    	for(j=0;j<m;j++)
    	{
    		if(j==0)
    			a[i][j]+= min(a[i+1][j], a[i+1][j+1]);
    		else if(j==m-1)
    		a[i][j]+=min(a[i+1][j], a[i+1][j-1]);
    		else 
    		a[i][j]+= min(a[i+1][j-1], min(a[i+1][j], a[i+1][j+1]));
    	//	cout<<a[i][j]<<" ";
    	}
    //	cout<<endl;
    }
    int find=INT_MAX;
    for(j=0;j<m;j++)
    {
    	if(a[0][j]<find)
    	 find=a[0][j];
    }
    if(find<gt)
    cout<<"YES\n";
    else
    cout<<"NO\n";
	}
    return 0;
}
